title: I'm not touching this mode with a 50ft pole.
body:
This might be the most disastorus game mode ever created.

* 90 min+ queue times.
* Horribly unbalanced RNG based item distrabution
* Little legends is a gambling heavy loot box nightmare

Riot said they want to make this mode permanent. If that happens in its curret state i would be surprised that it did over Nexus Blitz.

Good lord.

is a shame the company has lost 700 mill in revenue.

Its weird saying DAC is low on RNG when you have assassin crits, elves, ogre, CK, ect

But honestly the items are pure chaos in TFT as is, I've had a number of fair games but if I'm low on items I pretty much sit there like "Yup I'm guaranteed bottom 4".  In DAC even if you're low on items the enemies can deal with lots of shitty components, if the game is showering rings of health and robe of the magi they aren't combining into something gamebreaking.  In TFT you only need any 2 components so people start popping off with Shojin, RFC, Guinsoo's, ect very quickly.
That's entirely subjective, given enough people want to play TFT to cause server issues most people disagree.

1. It was the first day and its been one of the most hyped *new* game modes league has had in a long while. especially since the auto chess mode is starting to get a lot of hype in many other games as well. i honestly wasn't that surprised there was a long queue due to the fact pbe was how long of a que. yeah 90 min was absolutely bull but i mean they were handling maybe 100,000 players trying to join at one time, and probably many many more than that. now the time is now instant and stable, so now the 90+ min con is gone.
2. yeah everyone is complaining about the high rng item mechanic.
3. ...wtf... do you even see the beta mark everywhere on tft, and at the end of the game there is an orb in the result screen meaning loot. what will this orb do we do not know because again...I TS BETA. and you do realise everything league does monetize is purely cosmetic. everything else is completely free. including the chest and key system which increases if you are a kind and good player due to the honor system. 
so all this league is only going for $$$$ is actually dumb. they are far from even being close to EA standards and they are actually willing to change these systems if they prove to be too high in the realm of RNG/gambling. AND for tft you buy what you want. the capsules only have the animal you want. plus and icon. it's not gambling, you are buying what you see. you are buying that candy bar at the 7-eleven shelf. it's not gambling. it's self control.
you people are ripping on a brand new game mode. a mode that was in development specifically for FREE PLAYERS TO HAVE FUN. you don't need to buy anything to play it. you don't see them making urf having a paywall or even the main game requiring a monthly premium to level up or some bull. League in a whole is free from the start. and everything you buy with real money can either also be bought by blue essence or is purely cosmetic and give you no advantage whatsoever, they are there to just cool addons to your characters which could be earned for free, or is a way players can support league while also getting something for their favorite champ or game mode. *BOOM*

Guys, lets be honest. Tft depends just as much on RNG as normal League does. Think of what percentage of your games are basically decided the moment teams are assigned... Ofc it's always your teammates faults if you lose, and you carried if you win

/s
Difference being in one mode you actually play where as the other mode you sit back and watch.
